Table.TST_Jump:
Press <input id="Jump"/> to jump.
Hold down <input id="Jump"/> to jump higher.
Table.TST_FallFloor:
Use <input id="Down"/> + <input id="Jump"/> to jump
through thin platforms.
Table.TST_Attack:
Press <input id="Attack"/> to attack.
Press <input id="Ability"/> to backstep.
Table.TST_FullMap: Press <input id="Map"/> to view full map.
Table.TST_Door:
There are certain doors that are opened by
holding Miriam's arm in front of it.
Tilt <image id="RStickMove"/> to designate direction.
Table.TST_Candlesticks: There are shards that can be obtained by breaking certain candles.
Table.TST_EquipStart: Press <input id="Pause"/> to open Main Menu
Table.TST_Equip01: Equipment items can be viewed under EQUIPMENT inside the Main Menu.
Table.TST_Equip02: Select a slot to change equipment from your inventory.
Table.TST_Equip03: The item can be equipped by selecting it from the item list.
Table.TST_TriggerShard:
CONJURE SHARD
Press <input id="TriggerShard"/> to trigger a projectile magic. Consumes MP.
Table.TST_DirectionalShard:
DIRECTIONAL SHARD
Aim with <image id="RStickMove"/> and press <input id="DirectionalShard"/> to activate. 
Cast magic towards the aimed direction. Consumes MP.
Table.TST_EnchantShard:
PASSIVE SHARD
The effect will automatically activate when it is equipped.
Table.TST_Shard:
SHARD
A crystallized form of demon power. 
It cannot be handled by an ordinary human being.
Table.TST_SkillShard:
SKILL SHARD
A magic that has a permanent effect by acquiring the shard. 
This can be turned ON/OFF inside menu setting. Does not consume MP.
Table.TST_ShipsCannon:
Use the newly obtained "Flame Cannon"
shard to light the cannon fuse.
Table.TST_Save:
You can save your progress here. 
Walk over to the bench and tilt up <input id="Up"/> .
Table.TST_ManaRose:
Candles can drop a Mana Rose when destroyed.
A Mana Rose is a magical rose that slightly replenishes MP.
Table.TST_Consumable: Consumable items can be used by pressing <input id="Pause"/> under INVENTORY.
Table.TST_Gun:
A gun can be shot by equipping a consumable bullet.
When you run out of the type of bullet that was equipped,
 the bullet will be replaced with a much weaker, infinite bullet.
Table.TST_KeyDoor04: A Key of Celeste is required.
Table.TST_Station:
It looks like the door is locked by a machine.
Is something required to pass through?
Table.TST_SpecialArtsMaster: This technique can now be used with any weapon of the same type!
Table.TST_FamiliarShard:
FAMILIAR SHARD
A magic that summons forth a familiar. Does not consume MP.
Table.TST_EffectiveShard:
<input id="EffectiveShard"/>ï¼š MANIPULATIVE SHARD
A magic that will have a continuous effect by consuming MP.
Table.TST_TXT_ZANGETSU:
<input id="Attack"/>:Quick Slash
<input id="DirectionalShard"/>:Fierce Slash
<input id="TriggerShard"/>:Throw knives
<input id="RStickMove"/>:Restrain
<input id="EffectiveShard"/>:Annihilated Mind
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Up"/> + <input id="Ability"/>:Empty Blade
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Down"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_BottomRight"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Right"/> + <input id="Attack"/>:Wild God's Blade
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Down"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Down"/> + <input id="Attack"/>:Flying Vajra
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Right"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Right"/> + <input id="Attack"/>:Eternity
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Right"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Left"/><image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Right"/> + <input id="Attack"/>:Form Is Emptiness
Table.TST_BLD_UmbrellaCharge:
Charged Umbrella
<input id="Attack"/> 
Hold <input id="Attack"/> for stronger attack.
Table.TST_BLD_UmbrellaToss:
Umbrella Toss
<image id="Text_Command_Arrow_Up"/>+<input id="Attack"/>Throw an umbrella.
Table.TST_BLD_ScarletThrust:
Scarlet Thrust
<input id="BRV_EastButtonAttack"/> Release an offensive burst of blood.
Table.TST_BLD_ScarletThrust2:
Scarlet Thrust
<input id="BRV_EastButtonAttack"/> 
Hold <input id="BRV_EastButtonAttack"/> for stronger attack.
Table.TST_BLD_BloodRain:
Blood Rain
<input id="EffectiveShard"/>Summon rain of blood.
Table.TST_BLD_BloodPillar:
Blood Pillar
<input id="TriggerShard"/>Summon a pillar of blood.
Table.TST_BLD_BloodPillar2:
Blood Pillar
<input id="TriggerShard"/>Increased number of summoned blood pillars.
Table.TST_BLD_ScarletCyclone:
Scarlet Cyclone
<input id="RStickMove"/>+<input id="DirectionalShard"/>Fire an aimable cyclone of blood.
Table.TST_BLD_BloodSteal:
Blood Steal
<input id="InvertShard"/> 
Absorb blood to recover MP.
Table.TST_BLD_HighJump:
Blood of Flight
Allows you to jump higher than normal.
Use <input id="Up"/> and <input id="Ability"/> to activate.
Table.TST_BLD_Slide:
Sliding
Use <input id="Down"/> + <input id="Jump"/> to slide.
Table.TST_BLD_FloatingUp:
Wind Demon's Blood
Float for a longer duration while holding <input id="Jump"/>.
Table.TST_BLD_WaterProtect:
Water Demon's Blood
Grants protection from water.
Table.TST_BLD_SoulSteal:
Vampiric Blood
Recover HP when using Blood Steal.
Table.TST_BLD_GuillotineUmbrella:
Guillotine Umbrella
Umbrella spins and deals damage while holding <input id="Jump"/>.
